headline: Craig Moffett Believes the Charter-Cox Merger is “Mostly About Wireless”
summary: On May 16, Charter Communications Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) and Cox Communications announced a definitive agreement to merge their businesses to create a leading US cable and broadband operator. Shortly after the announcement, Craig Moffett of Moffett Nathanson joined CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ to discuss the merger: “I think this deal is mostly about wireless. I think it’s […]
